Yes, this game is certainly worthy of the "Test of Time" award. The physics are just as astounding today as the first time I played the game (which has now been a few years). Great puzzles, great out-of-the-box thinking, great enemy with a dark sense of humor... "Why don't you marry that thing if you love it so much?!" :D

LOVE Portal dearly!

The humor in this game has stood the test of time.  I enjoy showing this game to people that haven't played it and hearing all the hilarious passive-aggressiveness.  My friend introduced this game to me, it's the reason I got a Steam account years ago.  It felt like a hidden gem in the Orange Box.  It got me interested in Jonathan Coulton's music.  And brought me back into PC gaming.

Even though Portal is almost 10 years old it still has a absoultly incredible charm that made me fall in love with it. The reason why I think this game is so bloody briliant is that this game has a sense of mystery, a sense of humor, and a sense of horror that slowly brings you into it's completeley insane and messed up world you'll never want to leave, a world you won't forget.

Portal 2 is also pretty good but it's a little less mysterious than the original.

Portal is a really good game. I think it feels wrong to give a piece of media 10/10, but I can't think of anything that bothered me. It is just such a good game, I think it's justifiable to give it a 10/10. Saying that, it's not my favourite game, but still a damn good one. I highly recommend getting this game, no matter what type of gamer you are. This is a must-play for anyone who has even just watched someone play a video game. It's just that good.

LOVE the portal gun

I nominated this for the test of time award because it has stood the test of time. It does every aspect that it attempts to accomplish really well. It's a fun puzzle game, it has an engaging story, and the jokes are funny. It's efficient enough and clean enough that the visuals still look good. It teaches you how to play easily without making you feel like an idiot for the handholding or for being so incredibly hard you can't progress. It moves at a such a nice pace that you could easily spend all day playing until you beat it, and at the same time the transitions between levels are punctuated enough that you can take a break in between without feeling like you are doing a disservice to the story or gameplay.

Bottom line, Portal doesn't waste time attempting to give you the world and failing in more parts than it succeeds. It does everything it set it out to do and it does those things at a comparable level to the best games out there. There is nothing more you could ask for from a game.
One of the best games I have ever played. It is  full of genius ideas and puzzles. A must try.

Meu jogo favorito de todos os tempos! Portal é um exemplo de como algo simples pode ser genial, sem precisar de gráficos excepcionais, nem uma mecânica complicada. Além disso, tem um dos melhores personagens já criados, carregado de humor negro e um carisma incrível.
Junto com sua sequência, Portal é sem dúvidas essencial para quem gosta de jogos!

之前没有评测的习惯故现在才来叨叨这些。这可以说是个人作为玩家的入门作，最初接触是因为几年前深爱着单眼的A.I HAL9000，但这部作品可以说是彻头彻尾的第九艺术，就算对一个硬科幻物理爱好者而言你也绝对会被它扭曲并颠覆的空间定律吸引，然后是慢慢铺展开令人细想之后浑身发冷的剧情，完美。
如你们所言，的确是”时间考验”奖的最佳提名作。

Portal was a 2 hour tech demo that became an instant internet sensation. 

Most people who read this have probably already played or owned Portal, but if you still haven't experienced this game, it's worth doing. 

It's extremely simple and satisfying in what it is trying to accomplish. There is no unecessary flowery exposition, no "on-the-nose" hand holding of tutorials and no other obnoxius distractions that derail you from enjoying the game. 

This is one of those games that I re-install and re-play every year.

The Portal Games have always been my favourite games to play in terms of concept and story. Despite the concept itself being quite an interesting and strange concept, the execution that Valve had on this game is amazing. The game took years of programming and everything from the level design to the narrative to the visual style from the Source Engine makes this game a masterpiece in what games stand for. I truly love this game and would highly recommend it as a first game to anyone thinking of getting into gaming.
